children.text: Menu : once connected to your account, create favourites for easy access to your preferred content
Home TV : on this screen, you can watch France 24 live TV shows or TV on demand, the latest news bulletins, videos and shows
At any time, go to the News home screen by clicking the blue News button at the bottom of screen
Multitasking player: turn the player in a small thumbnail by pulling it to the lower right corner of the app. You can navigate the rest of the app

Listen to FRANCE 24
in audio only
